content: MIC-S90H Bracket Hot-dip galvanized (HDG) box profile bracket for connections to steel in heavy-duty applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Low weight for easier installation – no lifting devices needed Engineered to provide extra-high moment capacity Designed for fast, one-person installation for heavy- duty applications Applications Part of a modular system for supporting cable trays, pipes and miscellaneous secondary steel Fastening to concrete ceilings, walls and floors Cantilevers or other applications requiring an extra-high moment capacity Designed to provide extra-high load capacity Recommended for use in moderately corrosive outdoor and indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: DD11 MOD - HN 547, S235JR - DIN EN 10025, Baseplate : ASTM A36 Surface finish: HDG: min 75 µm - ASTM A123 Environmental conditions: Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) Technical Data | Material composition | DD11 MOD - HN 547, S235JR - DIN EN 10025, Baseplate : ASTM A36 | Surface finish | HDG: min 75 µm - ASTM A123 | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2179511 - Bracket MIC-S90-BH-2000 steel - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x MIC-S90-BH-2000 Bracket
